item.title: Uncheck a checklist
item.description: Check/uncheck the entire checklist in Google Documents Snippet Run it Ui triggers Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. Currently it is unknown if the checklist can be manipulated in Docs. Clark Lind suggests to replace a list item with a copy of one of them (which is in expected state – check/uncheck). We need to know the id – see printListIds() – of the list in order to be able to change it.
